Hammerhead

Apr 18, 2022 • Huang Yuanyin, Lin Xiaowei

Structure

2D representation

The secondary structure of the full-length hammerhead ribozyme with the general acid (red) and base (blue) is shown. The large arrow (baby blue) points to the scissile bond. The green line notes the tertiary interaction between the terminal loop of helix II and the internal loop in helix I.


Document


3D visualisation

The overall structure of the hammerhead ribozyme is shown. This representation was generated from PDB ID: 3ZD5 at 2.2 Å resolution. Note the tertiary interaction between the terminal loop of helix II and the internal loop in helix I.
PDBe Molstar - Helper functions
